name: City Dancer 3D
description:
What do you think is easier - to dance or toss the coins ? Give it a try - as more coins in the jar - so better the dance! But watch the wind indicator - you are in need to adjust your direction every time it changes.

There are 3 characters in this fun dance simulator: DJ Boy, Juliana and Mr. Cop. Each one with own charismatic moves.

Earn top score and share with your friends on the social networks !
